纐纈: (こうけつ) - style of tie-dying used during the Nara era
纔か: (わずか) - only; merely; (a) little; small quantity
纜: (らん) - Cabo de amarração, cabo de popa, cabo de atracação
缶ジュース: (かんジュース) - canned juice; canned soft drink; can of juice; can of soft drink
缶ビール: (かんビール) - canned beer; can of beer
缶偏: (ほとぎへん) - kanji "jar" radical at left
缶底: (かんぞこ) - bottom of a can
缶詰: (kanzume) - canned food, tinned food; confining someone (por exemplo, para que eles possam se concentrar no trabalho) , canned food, tinned food; confining someone (e.g. so they can concentrate on work); being stuck in a confined space
缶詰め: (かんづめ) - packing (in cans)/canning/canned goods/tin can; confining someone (e.g. so they can concentrate on work); being stuck in a confined space
缺ける: (かける) - to be chipped/to be damaged/to be broken; to be lacking/to be missing; to be insufficient/to be short/to be deficient/to be negligent toward; (also 虧ける) (of the moon) to wane/to go into eclipse
罅が入る: (ひびがはいる) - to get cracked; to develop a crack; to be fissured
罅ぜる: (はぜる) - to burst open; to pop; to split
罅割れる: (ひびわれる) - to crack; to develop a crack
罍子: (らいし) - tall container resembling a serving table (used for serving sake, confectionery, etc.)
罐: (かん) - Steam Boiler (Apenas o lado esquerdo)
罐詰: (かんづめ) - packing (in cans)/canning/canned goods/tin can; confining someone (e.g. so they can concentrate on work); being stuck in a confined space
罐詰め: (かんづめ) - packing (in cans)/canning/canned goods/tin can; confining someone (e.g. so they can concentrate on work); being stuck in a confined space
罔羅: (もうら) - comprising; including; covering; encompassing; comprehending
罠: (びん) - Trap , snare, trap (para caçar animais selvagens, etc.); trap (i.e. ruse, subterfuge, etc.)
罠にかかる: (わなにかかる) - to be caught in a trap (snare, etc.); to fall for (a trick, ambush, etc.)
罠に掛かる: (わなにかかる) - to be caught in a trap (snare, etc.); to fall for (a trick, ambush, etc.)
罠猟: (わなりょう) - animal trapping; hunting with traps
罩める: (こめる) - to load (a gun, etc.)/to charge; to put into (e.g. emotion, effort); to include (e.g. tax in a sales price); to hang over/to shroud/to enshroud/to envelop/to screen
罪: (culpa/crime) - guilt , crime, sin, wrongdoing, indiscretion; penalty, sentence, punishment; fault, responsibility, culpability; thoughtlessness, lack of consideration
罪がない: (つみがない) - innocent; not guilty; harmless
罪が無い: (つみがない) - innocent; not guilty; harmless
罪する: (つみする) - to charge; to sentence; to punish
罪に問う: (つみにとう) - to accuse somebody; to charge someone
罪に陥る: (つみにおちいる) - to slide into sin
罪のないうそ: (つみのないうそ) - white lie; harmless lie; fib
罪のない嘘: (つみのないうそ) - white lie; harmless lie; fib
罪の報い: (つみのむくい) - retribution for one's crime; punishment for one's crime
罪の報いを受ける: (つみのむくいをうける) - to pay for one's transgression; to receive punishment for one's crime
罪を憎んで人を憎まず: (つみをにくんでひとをにくまず) - condemn the offense, but not the offender
罪を犯す: (つみをおかす) - to commit a crime; to commit a sin
罪を着せる: (つみをきせる) - to pin a crime on
罪を着る: (つみをきる) - to take (another's guilt) on oneself; to be accused of
罪人を流す: (ざいにんをながす) - to exile a criminal
罪体: (ざいたい) - corpus delicti (concrete evidence of a crime, e.g. a bullet-riddled body)
罪刑法定主義: (ざいけいほうていしゅぎ) - nulla poena sine lege; no punishment without law
罪名: (ざいめい) - name of a crime; charge
罪悪感: (ざいあくかん) - feelings of guilt
罪源: (ざいげん) - substance of a sin; source of a sin
罪状: (ざいじょう) - charges; nature of offence; nature of offense
罪状明白: (ざいじょうめいはく) - (yoji) being proven guilty of a crime; having one's guilt for a crime made clear; (the) nature of offense being (becoming) clear
罪状糾明: (ざいじょうきゅうめい) - (yoji) closely examining (questioning) the concrete circumstances of a crime
罪状認否: (ざいじょうにんぴ) - arraignment; plea; making one's plea
罪科: (ざいか) - offense; offence; crime; guilt; punishment
罪責: (ざいせき) - responsibility or liability for a crime
罪跡: (ざいせき) - evidence of a crime
罪障: (ざいしょう) - sins (which prevent entry into bliss)
罪障消滅: (ざいしょうしょうめつ) - expiation of sins
罫: (けい) - Ruled Line , rule, (ruled) line; line (em um tabuleiro de go, tabuleiro de shogi, etc.)
置いてきぼり: (おいてきぼり) - leaving somebody behind
置いてきぼりを食う: (おいてきぼりをくう) - to be left behind
置いてきぼりを食らう: (おいてきぼりをくらう) - to be left behind
置いてけぼり: (おいてけぼり) - leaving somebody behind
